oai_dc:dc.dc:description: What the |kaggen (Mantis) does to see whether the people respect the eland. 1) This story was told to Dia!kwain by both his grandfather (!xugen-ddi) and father (Xaa-ttin), 2) See also Ssa ka Kumm and Further ceremonies in cutting up eland, 3) This story is found in Book V-17.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Mantis and the hunting of eland
